MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G11 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Thornwood Drive and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:40pm due to repairs required to our equipment on Thornwood Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:54pm on Saturday, 03 April 2021
